channel.title: The Bible is like...[chained analogy][NSFW]
channel.description:
[size=24pt]This is [b]not[/b] to be a hate thread. You will obey forum rules here, and any attacks at members will not be tolerated.[/size] Rules of this thread: [ul][li][b][size=14pt]You will not violate any laws.[/size][/b] - Any and all antisemitism will be dealt with accordingly. This is a thread where tolerance is a must. Freedom of Speech does have its limitations! You [b]will[/b] be reported to authorities for any threats related to ethnicity and/or beliefs. This is considered a [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hate_crime]hate crime[/url].[/li] [li][size=14pt][b]You are not to threaten any user or race or religion.[/b][/size][/li] [li][b][size=14pt]You will not be offended by other's comments.[/size][/b] If you believe this to be unreasonable, leave now and save yourself the trouble.[/li] [li][b][size=14pt]You will not attack any member.[/size][/b] - This is a peaceful community board[/li] [li][size=14pt][b]If you have a distasteful post, use a spoiler to cover the answer.[/b][/size] That way if someone is offended by it - they made the choice to open it.[/ul] Now that that is out of the way, lets get to the purpose of this post. This is meant to post analogies that begin with "The bible is like". These can be funny or serious in manner. Do not post anything purely hateful. Your goal is to answer the previous analogy and then post a new one for the next user. Example Post:
"The Bible is like a roller coaster."
Once you are strapped in, everything is out of your control. "The Bible is like a car"
It sucks to be hit by one. "The Bible is like a minivan"
-Everyone judges you when you stroll around with one -It was created with [i]children[/i] in mind "The Bible is like a Jew"
WARNING! This is an example distasteful post![spoiler]In case of misclick.[spoiler]Last chance![spoiler]They burn well.[/spoiler][/spoiler][/spoiler] "The Bible is like ..."
Now here is one to get you started :) "The Bible is like an excuse"

Rules of this thread:

[ul][li][size=14pt]You will not violate any laws.[/size] - Any and all antisemitism will be dealt with accordingly. This is a thread where tolerance is a must. Freedom of Speech does have its limitations! You will be reported to authorities for any threats related to ethnicity and/or beliefs. This is considered a hate crime.[/li]

[li][size=14pt]You will not be offended by other’s comments.[/size] If you believe this to be unreasonable, leave now and save yourself the trouble.[/li]

[li][size=14pt]If you have a distasteful post, use a spoiler to cover the answer.[/size] That way if someone is offended by it - they made the choice to open it.[/ul]

Christians deserve do die and I will murder all of you bible faggots.

I am offended by your post.

Davidi2, you are gay and I hate you.
